    • Method Detail

      • getIdealSplitSize

        public static long getIdealSplitSize(org.apache.hadoop.fs.FileSystem fs,
                     org.apache.hadoop.fs.Path[] input,
                     int numMapTasks)
                              throws IOException
        Gets the ideal split size for the array of paths. Recursively goes through the paths and counts all the bytes. Then uses this information and the given number of map tasks to return the ideal size.
        Parameters:
        fs - The FileSystem to use
        input - An array of file paths (or directories) to collect file size.
        numMapTasks - The number of map tasks you want to use for this job.
        Returns:
        The ideal split size to create the given numMapTasks .
        Throws:
        IOException

      • getAllPaths

        public static void getAllPaths(org.apache.hadoop.fs.FileSystem fs,
               List<org.apache.hadoop.fs.Path> destList,
               String... paths)
                        throws FileNotFoundException,
                               IOException
        Recursively goes through the given array of paths, populating destList with all paths underneath.
        Parameters:
        fs - The FileSystem to use
        destList - The destination list to hold the paths
        paths - One or more Paths to search.
        Throws:
        FileNotFoundException
        IOException
